snippet.title: Download RASHLANDER - Available Now on Steam!
snippet.description:
Download now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1054270/RASHLANDER/

RASHLANDER is a physics-loaded lunar lander roguelike that feels like spinning across an icy road and nailing a perfect parallel park. 

Inspired by arcade classics such as Asteroids and Lunar Lander as well as neo-retro games like Downwell, RASHLANDER’s controls are simple, pure, and easy to learn with successful gameplay relying heavily on a little luck and a ton of skill. 

Discover a dense network of game-changing upgrade systems and life-giving fuel stations—all while attempting to achieve the highest score in this skill-based, physics-stuffed tribute to the golden era of arcades.

Streamers can take advantage of Twitch integrated gameplay featuring viewer driven events, chat meta games, and chat members appearing as helpers or enemies in-game.

Learn more at:
https://hitcents.com/games/rashlander

Join Hitcents' Discord for more behind-the-scenes action:
http://discord.gg/hitcents
